    • Method Detail

      • getMealPlanForWeek

        @GetMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MealPlan> getMealPlanForWeek​(@RequestBody
                                                                            int calendarWeek)
        Gets the Mealplan for the specified calendarweek
        Parameters:
        calendarWeek - The Calendar Week of the year (for example: 45)
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with statuscode 200 and mealplan in Body

      • addRecipeToMealPlan

        @PostMapping("/addRecipe/{mealPlanID}")
public void addRecipeToMealPlan​(@PathVariable
                                int mealPlanID,
                                @RequestBody
                                Recipe recipe,
                                @RequestBody
                                java.util.Date day)
        Adds a recipe to a mealplan at a certain day
        URL: /mealPlanerAPI/addRecipe/{mealPlanID}
        METHOD: Post
        Parameters:
        mealPlanID - Id of the mealplan to add the recipe to
        recipe - The Recipe to add to the Mealplan
        day - Which day of the mealplan should the recipe by eaten at

      • deleteRecipeFromMealPlan

        @DeleteMapping("{mealPlanID}")
public void deleteRecipeFromMealPlan​(@PathVariable
                                     int mealPlanID,
                                     @RequestBody
                                     MealPlanRecipe mealPlanRecipe)
        deletes a recipe at a certain day from the specified mealplan
        URL: /mealPlanerAPI/{mealPlanID}
        METHOD: Delete
        Parameters:
        mealPlanID - Id of the mealplan to delete the recipe from
        mealPlanRecipe - Recipe which shall be deleted

      • createMealPlan

        @PostMapping("/createMealPlan")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MealPlan> createMealPlan​(@RequestBody
                                                                        MealPlan mealPlan)
        Creates a new Mealplan with CalendarWeek and Recipes
        URL: /mealPlanerAPI/createMealPlan
        METHOD: Post
        Parameters:
        mealPlan - Mealplan which shall be created
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with statuscode 200 and newly created mealplan in Body
